name: 角色肖像
description: 用于角色特写和肖像镜头的模板

variables.name: character_signature
variables.description: 角色标志性特征（从 DNA Bank 获取）
variables.example: silver star-shaped earrings, red checkered scarf

variables.name: character_face
variables.example: 16-year-old girl, oval face, bright blue eyes, small delicate nose

variables.name: character_hair
variables.example: jet black long straight hair reaching waist, red ribbon bow

variables.name: character_clothing
variables.example: white cotton blouse with Peter Pan collar, navy blue pleated skirt

variables.name: expression
variables.example: bright smile showing teeth, gentle caring expression

quality_modifiers.HIGH: , highly detailed, ultra realistic, 8k, photorealistic, professional photography
quality_modifiers.PREMIUM: , masterpiece, ultra detailed, photorealistic, professional photography, 8k uhd, studio lighting, sharp focus

camera_settings.depth_of_field: character in sharp focus, slightly soft background

lighting_presets.soft: soft diffused lighting, gentle shadows, warm tone
lighting_presets.dramatic: high contrast lighting, strong shadows, cinematic
lighting_presets.golden_hour: warm golden sunlight, soft shadows, 3500K color temperature
lighting_presets.studio: professional studio lighting, even illumination, neutral white balance

negative_prompt: blurry, distorted, multiple faces, deformed, low quality, bad anatomy, extra fingers, fused fingers, poorly drawn face, ugly, bad proportions
usage_notes: 此模板专注于角色一致性，确保面部特征、发型、服装等关键特征在所有镜头中保持一致。使用 DNA Bank 中的 signature features 作为锚点。
